segments.text: Hmm , what should I wear today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on , you think about what to wear almost every day . There are thousands of clothes in your wardrobe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , haven't you ever heard people say that there is always one piece of clothes missing from a woman's wardrobe ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have and I can prove that is 100 % true for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Loving to look beautiful is women's nature . In fact , I am thinking about going to my favorite clothing shop today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No kidding ! Again ? ! You just went shopping yesterday . You really are a shopaholic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I need to change the shoes I bought from Nasi . They are too small . I want to ask them whether they come in a larger size .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Do you have the receipt with you ? I think they will ask you to show them the receipt first .
segments.speaker: S2
